text.name: Courier Trunk - Decay Hammer
text.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] with this Skill's On Hit effects; instead, it inflicts 2 [DefenseDown] (once per Coin)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair]
- If this unit has less than 15 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair], gain 1 additional [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Burst] Count

text.name: Courier Trunk - Decay Hammer
text.desc:

text.name: Poludnitsa... I trust you!
text.desc:
At 10+ [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair], or if target has 6+ [Burst], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count, this Skill does not inflict [Burst] or [Burst] Count with its On Hit effects; instead, the final Coin gains +2 Coin Power
[WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst], deal +3% damage for every [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] (max 90%)
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +1 [Burst] Count
- Inflict +1 additional [Burst] Count for every 10 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] (max 2)

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Burst]
- Inflict +1 additional [Burst] for every 10 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] (max 2)
[OnSucceedAttack] If this Skill failed to increase the final Coin Power, gain 1 [Agility] next turn

text.name: Poludnitsa... I trust you!
text.desc:

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Burst]

[OnSucceedAttack] If this Skill's effect to raise its final Coin Power did not activate, gain 2 [Agility] next turn

text.name: Courier Assistance & Crisis Control System
text.desc:
[StartBattle] At 15+ [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair], activate 'W-wait, I need to do some maintenance...!.' instead (once per turn)
[StartBattle] If this Skill is to be activated, gain ([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] / 2)% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 15%, once per turn)

1101121.name: Speedy Courier
1101121.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed hits an enemy with [Burst], inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (3 times per enemy per turn)

1101101.name: A moment, please...
1101101.desc: Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain ([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair])% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 20%)

1101102.name: I'll do better next time...
1101102.desc: <For Chain Battles> When, after Retreating with '[Retreat]', if this unit rejoins the battle, halve the [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] value (once per Encounter, rounded up)

1101111.name: A moment, please...
1101111.desc:
Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain ([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair])% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 20%)
Upon Retreat, apply 1 [ParryingResultUp] to 2 allies next turn (prioritizes Substituted units first, then in Deployment order)
- Lasts for 1 additional turn for every 15 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] (2 more turns max)
